comments.body: This is both beautifully written, and a vital Voice, that should be heard.
Hey Mark I was just wondering how you can become a dungeon master with kink?
I just want to say thank you, Although i myself am not an adult performer. I still want to say thank you because a person close to me is and they are terrified to speak out and to share their voice.
Serisously though, interesting video and the sort of thing I hope youâ€™ll continue to do.
